string.value: #p2091001# asked me to visit #b#p2091002##k as he prepares a #bmedicine#k for #p2071006#...

#p2091002# was more than willing to make the medicine for #p2071006#, but...I have to gather up the missing ingredients for it...

#i4000292##t4000292# #b#c4000292##k/20 
#i4000276##t4000276# #b#c4000276##k/50 
#i4000279##t4000279# #b#c4000279##k/50
#b#p2091002##k told me to wait for a second as he makes the medicine.
자네가 바로 #p2091001#이 말한 여행자로군. #p2071006#가 어디 있는지 알려 줬다지? 정말 고맙네. #p2091001#이 길렀다고는 해도 #p2071006#는 #m250000000# 마을 전체에서 사랑받던 녀석이지~ 약이라면야 얼마든지 만들어 주겠네. 자네도 #p2071006#를 도와 주겠지?
고맙네. 하지만 약의 재료가 조금 모자라는구만. 인간에게 줄 약이 아니라 #p2071006#한테 줄 약이라, 평소에 안 들어가는 재료들이 필요하거든. 마침 자네가 도와주기로 했으니 #t4000276# 50개와 #t4000279# 50개, 산삼 달인 물 20개만 구해다 주게나. 그 녀석, 상처 치료약 말고 건망증 치료약도 만들어 줘야겠어.
응? 약을 만들어야 #p2071006#한테 배달도 할 텐데. 배달해주기로 했으니 이왕이면 재료도 모아다 주면 안 되는가?

So you're the traveler #p2091001# was talking about. #p2071006# told you about the whereabouts, right? Thank you so much. #p2091001# might have raised it, but #p2071006# is a beloved bird here at #m250000000#~ If you need a medicine, I can certainly make it for you. I am confident that you'll also help #p2071006# out. Right?

Thank you. Unfortunately, I am a little short on ingredients necessary for the medicine. Since this medicine isn't for humans but rather, for #p2071006#, you'll find ingredients there that you'll normally not see. Since you have decided to help out, I'd like for you to find #b50 #t4000276#s, 50 #t4000279#s, and 20 #t4000292#s#k. I'll have to make a medicine for it not just to take care of its injuries, but also to fix its occasional amnesia.

What? I'll need to make the medicine in order to deliver it to #p2071006#. Since you have decided to help me deliver the medicine, wouldn't it be nice if you can help me gather up the ingredients for the medicine?

Okay, you have gathered up all the ingredients necessary to make #p2071006# a fine medicine. Great work there! I like the fact that you have decided to step up and help #p2071006# out, after seeing its wings clipped.
I will make the medicine as soon as possible. Please wait for a second.
What? Did you forget the contents for the medicine? I need #b50 #t4000276#s, 50 #t4000279#s, and 20 #t4000292#s#k. Please don't forget it!
